dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Big Tech earnings: Wall Street 'underestimating' tech, Ives says
News Content: Big Tech earnings are coming next week. Microsoft (MSFT), Meta (META), and Tesla (TSLA) all report on Wednesday, while Apple (AAPL) reports on Thursday. Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research Dan Ives joins Morning Brief with Seana Smith and Brad Smith to discuss what to watch during Big Tech earnings.

Ives tells investors to "get the popcorn out" for Big Tech earnings, noting that Mark Zuckerberg's announcement that Meta plans to spend up to $65 billion on artificial intelligence (AI) capital expenditures (CapEx) is "the start of this massive build-out of AI CapEx that I think the Street's massively underestimating."

Ives says Big Tech's massive AI spending depends on the use case for each company.

"Ultimately, when you look at Meta, the AI capabilities on advertising, on subscriber growth, and ultimately, building out businesses that don't even exist today because it's all about monetizing that install base ... it's no different than the way that the hyperscalers have done it with Microsoft, Amazon, Google." the analyst explains. Related Videos

04:24

The big concern for equity markets right now

Yahoo Finance Video • 26 minutes ago 03:17

Tesla earnings kick off 'massive year ahead,' Ives says

Yahoo Finance Video • 1 hour ago

Ives adds, "Now it's going to start playing out on the consumer side ... Zuckerberg and Meta, they're one step ahead here in terms of where this is all heading."

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Briefhere.

This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.

View Comments

Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.

{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news],

}

```json

  "reasoning": "The news focuses on Dan Ives's bullish outlook on Big Tech earnings, particularly highlighting the significant AI investment by Meta and the potential for underestimation of AI's impact on the sector by Wall Street.  While the news is positive for the tech sector generally, it doesn't directly address Apple's specific performance or prospects.  Apple's earnings report is imminent, and the market's reaction will depend on the specifics of those results.  The previous predictions show a range of opinions, with some models leaning bullish and others bearish.  Considering the overall positive sentiment towards Big Tech and the upcoming earnings report, I'm assigning a slightly higher probability to a price rise, but acknowledging the inherent uncertainty associated with earnings announcements.  The lack of specific Apple-related information in the news makes a neutral prediction more appropriate than a strongly bullish one.",
```
